SEARCH
Package igym.controllers

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
igym.controllers.UserController
@RestController @RequestMapping(value="/api/v1", produces="application/json") @Validated public class UserController extends Object
REST controller for managing users. Provides endpoints for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting users.

  • Method Details

    • findAll

      @GetMapping("/users") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<UserDTO>> findAll()
      Retrieves all users.
      Returns:
      a list of users (as DTO) with HTTP 200 OK status

    • deleteUser

      @DeleteMapping("/users/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteUser(@PathVariable UUID id)
      Deletes a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the UUID of the user to delete
      Returns:
      HTTP 204 No Content status if deletion is successful
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if no user is found with the provided ID

    • createUser

      @PostMapping("/users") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserDTO> createUser(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid User user)
      Creates a new user.
      Parameters:
      user - the user entity to create
      Returns:
      the created user (as DTO) and HTTP 201 Created status
      Throws:
      DuplicateUserException - if a user with the same name already exists

    • updateUser

      @PatchMapping("/users/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserDTO> updateUser(@PathVariable("id") UUID id, @RequestBody @Valid @Valid User user)
      Updates the name of an existing user.
      Parameters:
      id - the UUID of the user to update
      user - the user entity containing the new name
      Returns:
      the updated user (as DTO) with HTTP 200 OK status
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if no user is found with the provided ID
      DuplicateUserException - if a user with the same new name already exists
